overview: The short animated film, 'Laro. Gawa. Tulog.' will be told from the perspective of a college student who strives to manage his time between his academics, his well-being, and his personal activities. During his college life, learning in an online environment during the Covid-19 pandemic got him interested because of an unusual series of events that happened to him. Within the story, there are exciting characters such as Laro, Gawa, and Tulog. They represent the main characterâ€™s, Abel, in three personas: His playful side, his student/hard-working side, and his vulnerable side.
title: Laro. Gawa. Tulog.
